introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Dragon Tiger Wild is the latest game from IDNLIVE EUROPE, bringing more excitement with the addition of the Wild Card. This game offers a new experience for Dragon Tiger fans, with fantastic winning opportunities up to 127x! LET’S GET WILD!!!

game-objective.title: GAME OBJECTIVE
game-objective.content: The objective of the game is to guess the higher card between Dragon and Tiger, and to use the Wild Card to form bonus wild combinations to achieve bigger winning prizes.

rules.title: GENERAL RULES
steps: The game will be hosted by the Dealer.
The game uses 8 decks of cards in a Shoe.
At the start of each new Shoe, the Dealer will draw one card to determine how many cards will be Burned or discarded. Up to 10 cards can be discarded.
After the betting time ends, the dealer will draw one card as the Wild Card, then deal one card each to Dragon and Tiger.
The side with the highest card value will be the winner. The highest value is K, which is worth 13.
If the result is a Tie, half of the Dragon and Tiger bets will be returned. The Tie bet only wins if the Dragon and Tiger cards have the same value.

dragon-tiger-wild-card.title: DRAGON TIGER WILD CARDS

wild-card-bet.title: WILD CARD BET
wild-card-bet.description: As mentioned in the introduction, Dragon Tiger Wild has a new gameplay element and exciting bonuses. Here is an explanation:
wild-card-bet.description-2: The Wild Card determines the win with a higher payout than regular bets. There are 5 types of Wild Bets:

dragon-wild.title: Dragon Wild
dragon-wild.content: This bet wins if the Dragon Card wins and its value is the same as the Wild Card.

tiger-wild.title: Tiger Wild
tiger-wild.content: This bet wins if the Tiger Card wins and its value is the same as the Wild Card.

super-wild.title: Super Wild
super-wild.content: This bet wins if all three cards tie — the Wild Card, Dragon Card, and Tiger Card all have the same value.

dragon-pair.title: Dragon Pair
dragon-pair.content: This bet wins if the Dragon Card and the Wild Card have the same value. (The Dragon Card does not need to win.)

tiger-pair.title: Tiger Pair
tiger-pair.content: This bet wins if the Tiger Card and the Wild Card have the same value. (The Tiger Card does not need to win.)

dragon.title: Dragon
dragon.description: Paid if the Dragon card value is higher than the Tiger card value.

tiger.title: Tiger
tiger.description: Paid if the Tiger card value is higher than the Dragon card value.

tie.title: Tie
tie.description: Paid if the Dragon and Tiger cards have the same value.

dragon-wild.title: Dragon Wild
dragon-wild.description: Paid if the Dragon side wins and the Dragon Card and Wild Card values are the same.

tiger-wild.title: Tiger Wild
tiger-wild.description: Paid if the Tiger side wins and the Tiger Card and Wild Card values are the same.

super-wild.title: Super Wild
super-wild.description: Paid if the values of the Dragon Card, Tiger Card, and Wild Card are the same.

dragon-pair.title: Dragon Pair
dragon-pair.description: Paid if the Dragon Card and Wild Card have the same value.

tiger-pair.title: Tiger Pair
tiger-pair.description: Paid if the Tiger Card and Wild Card have the same value.
